summary: A small sound file that silences the Rieklings' breathing.
descriptionHtml:
I couldn't help but get annoyed with the breathing sounds the Rieklings were making when they were idle in the Dragonborn DLC, so I edited the sounds to remove this.

This shouldn't effect any quests or dialogue with the Rieklings.

This works great with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/88348/?]PROMETHEUS_ts'[/url] follower mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31533/?]Slave Pack Riekling Porter[/url] without editing any of his/her custom files (which was mainly the inspiration to do this mod).

If there are any other Riekling mods I'm unaware of, this may effect them as long as they use the vanilla sound files. Â If you find it not to work and would like a compatible patch, simply leave a comment or PM me and I'll see what I can do.

To install, simply extract to your Skyrim/Data folder.
author: Sivos909
